abstract: Criticized that its ads are misleading, Pfizer said it would end a campaign using the artificial heart pioneer Robert Jarvik as a spokesman for its cholesterol drug Lipitor.
snippet: Criticized that its ads are misleading, Pfizer said it would end a campaign using the artificial heart pioneer Robert Jarvik as a spokesman for its cholesterol drug Lipitor.
lead_paragraph: Under criticism that its ads are misleading, Pfizer said Monday that it would cancel a long-running advertising campaign using the artificial heart pioneer Robert Jarvik as a spokesman for its cholesterol drug Lipitor.

headline.main: Pfizer to End Lipitor Ads by Jarvik
headline.print_headline: Pfizer to End Lipitor Ads With Jarvik
